Title: Revolutionary Girl Utena: The Movie
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Romance
Writer: Chiho Saitô (story), Yoji Enokido (screenplay), Kunihiko Ikuhara (story)
Actors: Tomoko Kawakami, Yuriko Fuchizaki, Leah Applebaum, Roxanne Beck
Plot: A handsome youth by the name of Tenjo Utena transfers to the distinguished Ohtori Academy. But Utena's true identity is actually a girl, who due to a certain event from her past, has ...
